dict.string:
2.2b5: - Updated iPhone/iPod touch support - Bug Fix: Regression - iTunes store previews were being scrobbled. - Bug Fix: Regression - Play media player works with iScrobbler once more - Bug Fix: possible crash
2.2b4: - Bug Fix: prefs window failed to initialize properly.
2.2b3: - Integrated iPhone/iPod Touch support. - Leopard only: New Local Charts: Month-to-date and Year-to-date. - Leopard only: Faster launch time. - Added 'reset network monitor' Applescript command. - Bug Fixes (mainly relating to the Local Charts).
2.2b2: - Pref to ignore iTunes Store podcasts has been exposed in the GUI. - Leopard only: Corrupted Local Charts databases are now automatically recovered and re-imported into a new database when migrating from the v2.0 format to the v2.1 format. - Bug fixes.
2.2b1: - Album chart data is now displayed in the Local Charts window. - Enhanced Local Charts profile report, including artist movements for Last.fm weekly archives. - Application Support files are now located in the Application Support/iScrobbler sub-folder. - The Local Charts database is backed up once per day instead of at application launch. - Bug fixes.
